different model...
here is the picture of the box:

> Il giorno mer 22 ott 2025 alle ore 11:50 SIMSONN

Hi Cristian,    We apologize for the confusion. You have received the correct product. The base plate is currently unavailable from our German warehouse, and we will ship it to you next Monday. Additionally, here is the tracking link for your Haptics Motors order:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045985077738

Ok thanks for the answer, I'd have preferred to be advised for the missing
item, since without baseplate it's useless at the moment..
 please I'll reccomend to send all missing part in the next shipment and to
send a quick shipping, as I'm stuck at the moment..
Thank you in advance.

Il Mer 29 Ott 2025, 10:14 service@simsonn.com
Hi Cristian,     We can ship the base plate to you from China via express delivery, but customs duties may apply. Do you require this service?

Thank you for your support, but don't worry, I don't not want you to be
charged for extra costs, so normal shipping is ok;
I've understand the misunderstanding, just keep me updated about the
situation;
ps: it would be a great add to have a direct whatzapp customer support,
maybe just for those who have bought your products..
Have a nice day, I'll wait for your news!


<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail>

service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Cristian,
>
> We can ship the base plate to you from China via express delivery, but
> customs duties may apply. Do you require this service?
>
>
>
>

Hi Cristian,    Thank you for your understanding. We may add WhatsApp for real-time customer service in the future, but it's not available yet. Have fun!

Gentle support,
Motors have arrived, any idea on the extimate date of arrival of the
baseplate to build the complete pedal set?
Thanks in advance,
Cristian

Il giorno mer 29 ott 2025 alle ore 10:14 service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> ha scritto:

> Hi Cristian,
>
> We apologize for the confusion. You have received the correct product. The
> base plate is currently unavailable from our German warehouse, and we will
> ship it to you next Monday. Additionally, here is the tracking link for
> your Haptics Motors order:
> https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045985077738
>
>

Hi Cristian,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock for the base plates, and restocking has been severely delayed due to customs clearance backlogs. We will ship your base plates via DHL Express within the next couple of days. We deeply regret the delay.
